title: 02x11: Application of the Financial Disclosure Requirements to Detailees under the Intergovernmental Personnel Act (IPA)
summary: Detailees under the IPA who occupy positions that fit one of the categories in section 13103 of the Ethics in Government Act (or that are of "equal classification" with those positions) are required to file public financial disclosure reports.  Agencies may require other detailees to file confidential financial disclosure reports.
